sen.e: In 1585 Kishu Province was subjugated at the order of Hideyoshi TOYOTOMI whereupon it came under the control of Hidenaga TOYOTOMI and, Naoharu YUKAWA`s Tomari castle (a mountain top castle located in Haya) was captured.
